verses.name: Ezekiel 29:1
verses.text: In the tenth year, in the tenth month, in the twelfth day of the month, the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:2
verses.text: Son of man, set thy face against Pharaoh king of Egypt, and prophesy against him, and against all Egypt:

verses.name: Ezekiel 29:3
verses.text: Speak, and say, Thus saith the Lord God; Behold, I am against thee, Pharaoh king of Egypt, the great dragon that lieth in the midst of his rivers, which hath said, My river is mine own, and I have made it for myself.
